catlinks.title: vZilla
catlinks.description: Welcome to the vZilla site. I as Michael Cade have been running this site now for the last few years, in different guises and different positions at various different companies. My interests from a technology point of view are really anything around the Data Centre arena.My current focus is around evangelizing all things Kubernetes and Cloud-Native technologies, everyone is new here and it is my goal to share my learning journey
